title: ValeishaButterfield + Nina Turner Interview
itunes:title: ValeishaButterfield + Nina Turner Interview
description:
Friday 3/17- Since it is woman's history month we had Valeisha Butterfield to speak on the Ween Academy ( Woman in Entertainment Empowerment Network). Also, Nina Turner a former state senator of Ohio came to visit to speak about Bernie Sanders, Donald Trump and her new TV show. In addition, Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to three males for shooting up a fast food restaurant, after receiving the wrong food order.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
